userStories.title: Create character-by-character text reveal pattern

userStories.notes: Implemented with character-by-character split using inline-block spans. Uses stagger: 0.03 (30ms per char) with back.out(1.7) easing for spring-like overshoot bounce effect. Live demo features 'KINETIC TYPOGRAPHY' hero text with gradient fill and multiple example cards.

userStories.title: Create word-by-word text reveal pattern

userStories.notes: Implemented with word-by-word split using text.split(' ') and inline-block spans. Uses stagger: 0.15 (150ms per word) with power2.out easing for smooth deceleration. Hero text 'WORD BY WORD REVEAL ANIMATION' with 4 demo cards showing variations. Whitespace preservation using {i < arr.length - 1 && ' '} pattern.
